name: Mercenary Knight
description:
Synopsis

The large army of skeletons are invading the peaceful town,fill the city with chaos. 

So the king decides to hiring the traveler,Mercenary Knight, to destroy the Skeleton King and it's army.

How to play

Clear skeletons army in the stage to go to the next stage

Control Botton

WASD = Move

O = Fireball

P = X Slash

Spacebar = Jump
